name: eleventy
description: Basic starter for building eleventy sitesâ€”with an Alpine, Turbo, Tailwind stack.

scripts.start: eleventy --serve --port=3000 & npx tailwindcss -i src/site/assets/tailwind.css -c tailwind.config.js -o dist/assets/style.css --watch
scripts.build: ELEVENTY_PRODUCTION=true eleventy --incremental && NODE_ENV=production npx tailwindcss -i src/site/assets/tailwind.css -c tailwind.config.js -o dist/assets/style.css --minify
